segments.text: I notice how the boy is stretching as far as he can, his little body almost vertical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s as if he believes that reaching for those cookies is the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks eager, her eyes wide with anticipation; it’s adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, I can’t shake the feeling that their innocent act is rooted in danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Seeing their excitement makes me smile, but I worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems to embody oblivion, so engaged in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels bittersweet watching this chaotic scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
